titles.title: For the relief of Shigeru Yamada.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 110-742.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 2.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

bill.summary:
6/15/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Shigeru Yamada.
